ModMetaData.name: Xenohuman Expanded [Facial Animation Patch]
ModMetaData.author: HohenHeizen
ModMetaData.description:
Facial Animation Patches for Xenohuman Expanded a mod by ILuvSilicon and SirLalaPy. Based on facial animation patches done by Roboslob.
I plan to go through and upsize the heads, so there's that. --- Contains • Glitterworlder • Lo-Gravver • Vatdrone • Gravity dwarf • Radworlder
Version <color=#FFD800>1.0.0</color>
